page.title: 13AYLESBURY MUSHROOM FARM
page.content: The company owns a 1000 acre unit at{ {Elmwood House}and{employs 180 people. {Mushrooms}are grown here all year. They have a{13 week cycle}and each week a fresh cycle is started with manure from 60,000 chickens, 400 horses & 3000 pigs. No chemicals are added, just water & air, and after regular turning for 6 days a non_smelling compost is formed.{Spore {from Switzerland}is added and the mushrooms grow in dark humid rooms at 68F. The air is changed 4 times an hour. The trays are'picked over'for the last 7 weeks of the cycle. 3\ million pounds of mushrooms are produced annually. The farm has a {piggery}of 3000 pigs. 8000 piglets are born each year and sold for fattening at 8 weeks. They grow{oats and corn}to feed the pigs.There is no waste as old compost is returned to the corn fields
